518430.book: The Names of the Prophet, may Allah Bless Him and Grant Him Peace
518430.reference:
Reference  : Muwatta Malik 518430
In-book reference  : Book 61, Hadith 430
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 61, Hadith 430
518430.text: Malik related to me from Ibn Shihab from Muhammad ibn Jubayr ibn Mutim that the Prophet, may Allah bless him and grant him peace, said, "I have five names. I am Muhammad. I am Ahmad. I am al-Mahi (the effacer), by whom Allah effaces kufr. I am al-Hashir (the gatherer), before whom people are gathered. I am al-Aqib (the last)."
